headline: Schlage Trust Win and Rising AI Orders Could Be A Game Changer For Allegion (ALLE)
summary: In recent days, Allegion’s Schlage brand was named America’s most trusted door lock and hardware brand for the seventh consecutive year, while commentators highlighted strengthening demand for the company’s electronic and access-control solutions. Together, this reinforces Allegion’s positioning at the intersection of trusted physical security and growing interest in AI-linked access technologies. With these developments and growing AI-related orders in focus, we’ll examine how they...
